website_summaries.verdict: Between its 55 hr. burn time, yummy scents, and your personal message, this is a great way to gift someone a quality soy candle.
pros: Choose personal text, scent, and font combination for your soy candle
Unique scents like coconut lime and lemon sherbet available
cons: May take 1 or 2 days to create your special candle

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this candle
customer_reviews.text: I was a little questionable when I ordered this about how the personalization would be, but it was PERFECT! I fell in love with this candle and can’t wait to give it to my boyfriend for Christmas. You can customize it however you want and it smells so much better than store bought candles. I recommend 100%, I will buy again definitely! The care you get is amazing! Buy this instead of store candle. I was excited that I could put the saying me and him say to eachother on the candle!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Reed

customer_reviews.title: Good idea until it’s not
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this candle for Valentine’s Day and was pretty disappointed. It was supposed to arrive on the 11th and didn’t get here until the 19th. I even paid extra for the expedited shipping. When it arrived, it was a mess. The candles oil seeped through somehow ruining the label and gotten all over the inside the box and the outside of the candle. The scent wasn’t my favorite either, but that’s just personal preference. It smelled more like Dial soap than fresh linens. I should’ve just made my own.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a customized candle, Lavender Vanilla scented, for my step-mom for Christmas. Words cannot express how perfect this candle is and how wonderful it smells!!! I will definitely be buying more of these, same scent, as I need some for my house too now!!! :) I couldn't be happier with my purchase. Thank you so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: great gifts
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my staff for holiday gifts. I bought 1 extra to keep/test myself and they are really nice. The fragrance is not overwhelming but still enough that you smell it while its burning. the Soy is burning slowly and we have burned it for many hours and still have 1/2 of it left. I think the team will love the smell and the personalization of the gift, it has thought behind it not just some silly candle I picked up at the store for them.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn L.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and easy to customize but....
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and easy to order but I am not crazy about the smell. I ordered the eucalyptus one hoping it would be similar to Bath & Body works stress reliever. It smells more like pine. Scent is difficult to describe but personally I just don’t care for it. I’d definitely buy again but would try other scents.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi A

customer_reviews.title: A Thoughtful Gift Idea!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister and her husband's Anniversary, and everything looks perfect, although I did add some drawn-red hearts and xoxo for an even more personalized look, and they pop with the black writing. I picked the Banana Pancake and love it so much, I want for myself!! Yum!! A very cute and thoughtful gift!!! I’m very happy!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C

customer_reviews.title: Personalization was great
customer_reviews.text: I love that I was able to personalize this candle. I bought it for my mil 80th birthday. The scent is pleasant without being overwhelming. Also, it arrived a lot quicker than I had anticipated. I love to give personalized gifts and this is one that I can see ordering again for other occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, gorgeous candle
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a personalized candle on Wednesday and it arrived on Saturday! I had ordered this a month in advance because I wanted to make sure my gift arrived in time for Mother’s Day. Such a fast turnaround time and the candle is flawless. Packaged securely, smells gorgeous, looks beautiful. I’m so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Wilhelmi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! This candle came exactly as I asked and it shipped super quick. Personalization is a beautiful touch and price was beyond fair. Great smell, lavender!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS and the smell is so nostalgic (lavender,vanilla) and I am so grateful they were willing to put the curse words hahaha (a gag gift for my sister). Love this. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Stroud

customer_reviews.title: Candle looked great but it arrived totally shattered
customer_reviews.text: Candle looked great but it arrived totally shattered. Tried contacting seller via two different methods and no response. Too bad, had to go make my own personalized candle. A little more work but got the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great personalized gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this candle. I ordered in the vanilla scent and it is a beautiful rich and creamy vanilla, unlike the flat note you sometimes get. The candle was packaged securely bubble wrapped inside a snug box with care instructions included. The label on the jar was beautiful and i love that it includes little details like the initials of the individual that poured the wax and affixed the label, along with a candle number.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Fern Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Great job of printing the text!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this candle and the efficiency of getting it quite quickly since it is personalized. I chose a scent at random of course since there's no way to sample that ahead of time, but I got the Mediterranean one and it was very pleasant. I used it as a "Happy 1st Mother's Day" gift to my daughter-in-law and she loved it! Very cute idea and I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Myrna Richard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful scent. Purchased this for a secret Santa gift and everyone thought it was epic and made me look like a Santa Ninja! The fact that you can have a custom label really adds a lot of heart to this product. Will repurchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Fun item
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fact that anything could be put on these labels. Put some “funny” ones on mine to be used as Christmas game gifts. I’m sure they will be a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Laci

customer_reviews.title: So fun to give as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: I customized the label to say "Craig's Barn" so my husband would use it in his man cave. He's not a candle person at all, but it smells great and he did like it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Holly

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful !
customer_reviews.text: I love this candle ! My mom recently moved from our family home to a small condo. It's been a stressful time for her and I wanted to give her something soothing with a particular quote on it. I was so happy when I found this candle. The process was sooooo easy. I chose the coconut and lime scent which is SO GOOD! It took less than a week to reach me. Came right before Mother's Day so it was perfect. Honestly love this company and I plan on ordering again !
customer_reviews.author: Lauren De Napoli

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I had such a wonderful experience working with this vendor. The first candle that arrived was melted and wax had seeped onto the beautiful label. They immediately sent a new candle and allowed us to keep the defective one. The product is amazing. Looks beautiful and seems incredible. Top quality product. We will certainly buy these again. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Buys-A-Lot

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: The customizations that I made came out just how I wanted! My mother loved it for mother’s day. The only tiny downside was that you couldn’t really smell the candle when it was burned. But that might have just been because the scent I chose was not potent. (Cucumber melon).
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful gift for any occasion.
customer_reviews.text: This candle is a wonderful gift idea. My sister passed and I was looking for a keepsake that was more than just a knickknack to be discarded in a year. I purchased 5 for the special people in her life. This will be around along time. Even when the candle burns out I imagine a tealight or votive would be very pretty in when the candle burns out. I got vanilla lavender and it smells so good. I will buy again for any occasion! I purchased on July 6 and received July 11. That's fast!
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Objects in pictures are much smaller than they appear
customer_reviews.text: The description for this item is very tricky. It makes it look like it’s a full sized candle by the image. By the price it should be as we could have gone to Yankee Candle bought a personalized jar candle for nearly the same cost and double the size! We were very disappointed when the item was so small once it was received. It also took quite a while to arrive too. However I will say once gifted, the item smelled incredible once burning. It’s definitely a high quality candle. Personalization looked good too. We did have to add to our gift due to the embarrassment of its size.
customer_reviews.author: Jami Wojnowiak

customer_reviews.title: Great marketing tool; a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Love these as marketing give-aways - the cursive writing is a bit hard to read and I don't love that the company name is very largely printed on label but otherwise great as a memorable give-away and way to market or co-sponsor a gift - good sent, a bit smaller than I'd have wanted for the cost but nice nevertheless with other items in a basket. Company has great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Lisi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift Item
customer_reviews.text: My daughter, had previously ordered several candles for attendees at a special birthday party for me which were a big hit. As a result, I ordered a personalized candle for her as a rememberance after her beloved cat had recently passed. The seller forwarded a proof before completion which was appreciated. The candle arrived promptly, nicely packaged, and was very unique. Unfortunately, the scent picked was a bit too strong, but the previously ordered "birthday" scent she loved would not have been appropriate. A perfect gift for many occassions. Would definitely order again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Elinor G.

customer_reviews.title: Great place
customer_reviews.text: Order for mother's day even tho I knew it wudnt b shipped in time. I sent an email and asked if there was any way to send by mother's day. She got it today,the day after! N I'm so happy! She loves it and I love it and smells wonderful. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for fathers day to my hubby. I love the smell and the the fact that I could personalize it. They messed up the writing on the candle and it's a little confusing. I don't remember what scent I ordered and it's not written on the candle. Separate and apart from those 2 small issues it's an awesome gift and he should like it.
customer_reviews.author: Antonette L.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in time & in a lovely little box, the lettering was just how it was depicted in the selection area. & it smells wonderful. Just be aware that it does take about 7-10 days from the day you place your order
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable candle, with a fantastic scent!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my mom as part of her mother's day gift. She's vacations in Mexico each winter, and always misses it when she's back home in MN. I got her the coconut lime scent candle, and personalized the labels. The smell is so nice and clean, it's like summer in a jar. She absolutely loved it, I'll definitely be giving these as gifts in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Sara H

customer_reviews.title: Perfection in a personalized gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for his birthday and it’s such a perfect personalized gift. It smells wonderful, it’s such a perfect size and I love that you can personalize it with pretty much whatever you want. I plan on buying more! :)
customer_reviews.author: Grace Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: Super cute gift
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this and customized it for a friends 1st Mother's day gift. I choose the most popular scent and it was very nice and clean. The writing was adorable on the lid and on the jar of the candle. I would recommend this as a nice personal gift for someone.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Bulgier

customer_reviews.title: Cute candle, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute candle. A little smaller than expected but really precious. Arrived faster than quoted time and in great condition. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon C

customer_reviews.title: Personalized!
customer_reviews.text: I gave scent 4 stars because I only smelted it, before being lit. Other then that 5 stars, came two weeks earlier then stated. It was beautifully done and I’m happy with the outcome!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Forester

customer_reviews.title: Impressive gift
customer_reviews.text: This made a big splash as a birthday gift! I included it with some bath products that I made to match the scent of this candle. Super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Julianna R Marketer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good product. The smell isn’t as strong as I had hoped. Smells great, just isn’t very strong when lit. Also is kind of expensive for how small it is. Love the customizable features
customer_reviews.author: McKenna

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty cool for what it is
customer_reviews.text: The candle and its packaging was great, no issues. But the eucalyptus doesn't smell like eucalyptus, like at all. But the design came out amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: I love how it smells. I ordered the lavander scented one but it’s a little too strong. I loved the font and my friend loved it. Great choice. Although I wish it was a bit bigger. Decent size for a candle.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product! Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Mine came very fast, smelled strong and looked great! I got a pine smell for my mother in law and put a quote about her favorite place on it. It looked wonderful and was in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a go to for gifting
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this candle, the personalized touch makes it that much more special. I got it my Anniversary and now just ordered one for a friends birthday. Definitely one of my go toos for gifting. The customer service is great as well I had a small hiccup and they fixed it right away!
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for special occasions!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this candle to use on the memory table for my parents 50th Anniversary party. It arrived in a timely manner and I absolutely loved it. There are many options for font and I chose the lemon sherbet scent which smelled crisp & summery. Candles are a great gift and the fact you can personalize makes me highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B

customer_reviews.title: Candles and inscription
customer_reviews.text: The candles and inscription were beautiful, and my daughters loved them! My only suggestion would be that they be a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Heisler

customer_reviews.title: Good Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The first candle leaked during delivery, however I sent them a message letting them know and they immediately sent me another one. I have the Vanilla one and it smells good and the package looks exactly as described. The text looks a little smudged, however as both candles have the text smudged in the exact same way, I think that may just be the font I chose.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Vincent

customer_reviews.title: 3 day shipping/designed well
customer_reviews.text: The product is a gift for my mother. Smells decent. Packaged very well and the concern for everything to be satisfactory from the seller is much appreciated. I will definitely buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Jones

customer_reviews.title: Candle arrived quickly & it is very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness this came quickly! I like this candle so much so, that I am going to order more. Not only now, but I will again at holiday time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my mother, wasn’t sure if she’s like it but it turned out great. The smell is great I got the toasted marshmallow, I also like how they‘ll allow cures words lol. My mom loved it, over all great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lyss

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in everyday
customer_reviews.text: Loved making the personalized label for top of lid and front of Candle. Everyone whom received gift loved the personalization of product. Going to buy more for "my own" creations for Valentines Day gifts.
customer_reviews.author: SN from SR

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product and service
customer_reviews.text: The product itself was beautiful and arrived fairly quickly. The candle smells as expected and the personalized labeling made it a perfect Mothers Day gift (which she loved). What was more impressive was the service from the company that reached out multiple times to make sure everything was satisfactory. I will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, smells good, so pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my bestie who just found out she was pregnant after struggling to conceive. I added the perfect quote and she was in tears! I absolutely recommend this candle!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift and Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my fiancé, and we both love it! It’s the scent of our wedding greenery, and our inscriptions were perfect. Only wish it was bigger so we could have it around longer 💗 keeping the glass case and using as an ornamental decoration in our house. Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Saveriano

customer_reviews.title: Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Nice gift to give my best friend of 35 yrs. Brought tears to his eyes. That's is a worthwhile gift. Thanks for making it possible.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Malicoate

customer_reviews.title: The best idea as a gif
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful house warming gift. The personal touch is heartfelt. The candle arrived quickly and in perfect condition. The smell was light and not overwhelming. I’m ordering another as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jonesy

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this turned out even better than I thought. I sent it to my brother and it said something funny on it. His girlfriend opened it over facetime and we were laughing so hard we were crying. Hands down the best gift ever!
customer_reviews.author: Renate Flachsenberger

customer_reviews.title: Great candle!
customer_reviews.text: The scent (lavender vanilla) is amazing! The font I chose is #7, if I had to change anything I would have picked a different font just because nothing was capitalized ie., names. The shipping was fast, and came in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Thank you gifts
customer_reviews.text: Used to thank my mom and mother in law for throwing me a babyshower with a cute message. Would repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute gift idea! The presentation is perfect, the scent is wonderful, and it arrived very quickly! I will most definitely be buying more of these candles! Great price, too!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Jean

customer_reviews.title: she loved to said it smelled great
customer_reviews.text: I had this shipped to my mom for mother's day/ birthday, she loved to said it smelled great. I didn't get to smell or see it since she lives 3 hours away but she said it was very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift!
customer_reviews.text: It smells amazing and it was so personal! It came in very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Warwick

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as part of a gift exchange and I’m sure it will be enjoyed. I was apprehensive of the lavender vanilla scent, but it is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Ole10910

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my mom for Christmas. It smells so nice and she loved it so much! Such wonderful candle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gifts and conversation pieces
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these as a gift (very well received). I loved the option to personalize this item with words that were meaningful to me and the recipient. The candle was high quality and smelled amazing. It was packaged well and arrived much sooner than anticipated. I will be buying more of these for various occasions. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: AOII Properties

customer_reviews.title: Awesome candle and gift!
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing and such a cute gift!! My boyfriend loved it for our anniversary. I think we got the lavender scent. Strong, but not too strong!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: On time, smells nice, well done. A very sweet gift idea. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Well made and great gift. Candle smells good. Arrived earlier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Truthbetold

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Birthday candle smells great! Lots of customization options. Would totally buy again! Order in advance to be safe!
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Candle was somewhat smaller than expected but the scent made up for it . The scent was exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Madonna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mother and it arrived very quickly(especially being that we are in COVID pandemic)and in a nice box. The scent is very nice and candle is beautiful. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift and the personal touch was fabulous. She loved the candle!
customer_reviews.author: Junie Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Good candle
customer_reviews.text: These candles are lovely and make great gifts. Unfortunately the increase in price won't allow me to continue purchasing as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Hope

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive
customer_reviews.text: I used this in an Anniversary gift box. The personalization was great, it was very attractively presented.
customer_reviews.author: happy mom

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful quality packaging and font/label came exactly as displayed during preview. Such a great scent and great gift. I don’t normally take time write reviews but this was exceptional!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the candle, smells great, and the fact that you can personalize it makes it the perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Cohen Stith

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this candle to give as a gift, and it was perfect. It arrived quickly and intact, smelled wonderful, and was personalized. I have no complaints. I would definitely purchase one again and would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Good idea
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift. I like the soy idea, and the personalization was a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne K.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This candle was very well made, lovely fragrance and arrived on time in good sturdy packaging. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Annie T

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Was so sweet! Customized these candles for my bridesmaids. They came quickly and they smelled exactly like advertised. I got the banana pancakes for reference! I need to order one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit. The product was very nice and beautifully presented. High recommendation. Worth the price and more.
customer_reviews.author: Kim W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was amazing to be able to create a customizable gift! It looked fabulous and shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Loved the candle smell and the fact I was able to personalize it. Great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jajuanna

customer_reviews.title: Super cute packaging
customer_reviews.text: Everything was perfect. The smell is good, but faint. I had cinnamon bun, so maybe other scents would be a little stronger. But even so, I’d definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! Exactly as described and the personalization and ability to choose the font you prefer is perfect. Turn around time was VERY fast! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect personalization and smells!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered four of these on Black Friday and they arrived within the following week! The smells were true to the description, and the personalized writing was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ezra Trantina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Scented Candle
customer_reviews.text: They were very well customized and were shipped very fast. Oh and the boyfriend really love them.
customer_reviews.author: Lover Boy

customer_reviews.title: Fun idea!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute candles. I bought for grandparents and put all the grandchildren’s name on front label. They were shipped fast!!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa May

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Anyone on Your List!
customer_reviews.text: This made the perfect gift for my daughter's 21st birthday. Loved the presentation of the package and the candle is great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Moen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great gift for my best friend. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Customized and Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this candle! I bought it as a Christmas gift for a friend. The customization was free with the price of the candle and made it so much better! It smells exactly how I wanted it to. Just great overall.
customer_reviews.author: Jodee Denklau

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic gift! Would highly recommend and certainly purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic gift! Would highly recommend and certainly purchase again. Haven't burned the candles yet, actually b/c they look to good on the mantle to burn!
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: Great/Affordable gift! Fast production!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Such an affordable, thoughtful gift idea. I was very impressed with the final product and how fast it was delivered!
customer_reviews.author: Mbrown

customer_reviews.title: High quality product. Great Personalization.
customer_reviews.text: The candle came well packaged and just as I ordered it. I ordered the Linen scented candle and once it heats up it emits a wonderful but not overpowering scent. I’m very pleased with this product. I will be using these as leave-behinds for my clients in my Staging Business.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best gift
customer_reviews.text: it's a great gift for friends and family. Makes gifting more sincere since it's personalized
customer_reviews.author: mirandalo

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT gift for anyone. I got it for my mom for Christmas and it smelled great and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Quinlyn

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait to buy more
customer_reviews.text: The candle smelt so good! I gave it to my friends who are in a relationship together and they loved it! The quality of the candle is a lot higher than the price I paid for it :)
customer_reviews.author: Lara Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Love this candle! It arrived quickly & packaged perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The candle has a nice smell to it..nice but not overpowering..
customer_reviews.author: bruce r modzelewski

customer_reviews.title: 5 star service
customer_reviews.text: Quality product and business. These are the places I don’t mind spending my bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Cree Dee

customer_reviews.title: GREAT! FAST! PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Came just in time for VDAY and smells great and the customization is perfect! 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Angela Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 3 this year and they are so awesome
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: A nice way to send a personalized message other than a card.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these candles as gifts, and they both loved them. They both thought the smell of the candle was great.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these for a co-workers birthday and I am so impressed. Beautiful product, smells AMAZING and she will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Focal PLLC

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful smell & easy to order
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease of ordering & personalizing this wonderful candle. Reasonably priced & the smell is divine. My friend loved the candle very much. I will be ordering more in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Cute :)
customer_reviews.text: My sister loved it! Lavender vanilla was a little vanilla heavy but otherwise was great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for a gift to my bridesmaids! I loved it and they loved it too!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this candle! The smell is wonderful and strong and I love that you can personalize it!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

product_meta.title: Personalized Scented Soy Candle - Custom Hand Crafted Gift made with 100% Soy Wax.
product_meta.description:
Our personalized 8oz and 16oz Custom Candles are easy to personalize - use the options provided to tailor your candle to your needs. These make fabulous unique gifts for loved ones, friends & family any time of year. 
Pick from any of our amazing fragrances, and customize your candle with 20 gorgeous font styles for any name, message, quote or short sentence, if you're not sure just send us a message- we'll be happy to help :) Lids can be personalized at no additional cost. 
Hand Made and Designed In Knoxville, Tennessee.

Candles ship in custom fit boxes with your chosen fragrance on the label. 

Silver Dollar Candle Co. Candles are handmade, hand poured, hand labeled and made with 100% Natural Soy Wax, expertly scented and made in small batches for the ultimate care and attention. 


Candle Features: 

 *  Unlike Parrafin Candles, which release harmful toxins into the air, our Soy wax Candles burn cleanly.
 *  Expertly scented & hand-poured from our dedicated facility in Knoxville, TN 
 * 8oz: 40-55 hour average burn time 
 *  Approx Size: 3” diameter by 3.9” tall, 8oz Flint Glass Container
 * 16oz: 80-100 hour average burn time 
 *  Approx Size: 3.2” diameter by 4.9” tall, 16oz Mason Jar Container
 *  Silver lid 
 *  Hand Labeled 
 *  Clean burning, natural soy wax
 *  Soy wax is grown in America and Supports American Soy Farmers
 *  100% Cotton Wick (Lead/Zinc/Heavy Metal free) | Many larger candle retailers use wicks with metal cores to maintain rigidity. Our wicks are 100% Cotton and do not release any heavy metals into the air.
